array_parameter.description: An array parameter. It has a name, an array type, and a shape.

boolean_parameter.description: A boolean parameter. It has a name.

coordinates.description: An array of two or three numbers representing the x, y, and optionally z coordinates of the position.

causes.description: The resolvers that caused this flaw.

integer_parameter.description: An integer parameter. It has a name and, optionally, a minimum and maximum value.

linear_ring.description: A linear ring is a closed LineString with four or more positions. The first and last positions are equivalent (they represent equivalent points). It MUST follow the right-hand rule with respect to the area it bounds, i.e., exterior rings are counterclockwise, and holes are clockwise.

point.description: A point is a position in coordinate space.

real_parameter.description: A real parameter. It has a name and, optionally, a minimum and maximum value.

preconditions.description: The preconditions that must be satisfied for this resolver to be applied.

string_parameter.description: A string parameter. It has a name.

symbol_parameter.description: A symbolic parameter. It has a name and a list of allowed symbols. If multiple is true, the parameter can have multiple values among the symbols.

info.description: The Urban Sensing and Planning Engine (USPE) API
info.title: Urban Sensing and Planning Engine API
